description: Hero levers for external-facing exposure. Plain-English, outcome-focused levers shown in early-stage conversations.

heroLevers.externalDescription: Reduce LTL shipments by consolidating loads and optimizing truck utilization
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Stop sending half-empty trucks. We help you consolidate shipments to fill trucks properly and cut freight cost.

heroLevers.externalDescription: Optimize routes to reduce distance, tolls, and transit time
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Use the smartest routes, not just the familiar ones. Cut unnecessary kilometers and tolls.

heroLevers.externalDescription: Digital multi-vendor bidding for non-contract freight
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Get 3-5 vendor quotes instantly instead of calling around. Always know you're getting the best spot rate.

heroLevers.externalDescription: Reduce truck waiting time at plants and delivery points
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Cut the hours trucks waste waiting at your gates. Slot booking and faster processes mean lower detention penalties.

heroLevers.externalDescription: GPS tracking and digital POD capture for all shipments
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Know where every truck is, and get delivery proof instantly—not weeks later via courier.
Stop the back-and-forth calls. Send indent, get confirmation, track placement—all in an app.

heroLevers.externalDescription: Automated generation and tracking of compliance documents
heroLevers.plainEnglishPitch: Auto-generate E-Way Bills and compliance docs. No manual errors, no last-minute scrambling.
